roleset.name: unsuitable

example.name: arg1
example.text: What [*] is inappropriate is to try to ram something through the process that is totally out of whack and then complain that the process is " broken . "

example.name: sassafras
example.text: Fashion magazines and television shows may portray women in sassy work attire, but this type of clothing is inappropriate for most offices.

roleset.note: INAPPROPRIATE-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-4,5, appropriate.01. (from inappropriate.01-j)
